title: Parler = The Feds? Satanic Lap Dances
itunes:title: Parler = The Feds? Satanic Lap Dances
description:
In episode 847, Miles and guest host Jamie Loftus are joined by My Momma Told Me's Langston Kerman to discuss Parler selling out their users, LA's fight with Echo Park's unhoused community, Trump crashing weddings, vaccine passports, cancel culture, Lil Nas X's new music video, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Parler explains 'free speech' to angry users after sharing Capitol riot posts with the FBI
  2. Knock LA reporter arrested while covering Echo Park protest, charged with failure to disperse
  3. Who Keeps Us Safe?
  4. Reporters, legal observers cry foul after being caught up in LAPD’s mass arrests at Echo Park protest
  5. The Fight for Echo Park Lake: Fences and Neighbors
  6. DONALD TRUMP MAR-A-LAGO WEDDING SPEECH ... Enough About The Couple, Let's Talk About Me
  7. ‘Vaccine passports’ are on the way, but developing them won’t be easy
  8. 64 percent view 'cancel culture' as threat to freedom: poll
  9. Lil Nas X’s Sexed-Up ‘Montero’ Video Has Changed Everything for Queer Music Artists
  10. The downright homophobic conversation surrounding Lil Nas X right now.
  11. Right-wing pastor Greg Locke is not a fan of Lil Nas X (apologies for the quality of the video - the livestream of Locke's service today was glitchy.)
  12. Nike denies involvement with Lil Nas X 'Satan Shoes' containing human blood
  13. Missed this from yesterday's Fox & Friends: they were talking about Lil Nas X and the satan shoes thing. Pete Hegseth had to be corrected by the weather guy. Just A+ all around.
  14. Lil Nas X 'Satan' shoes stir new political controversy
  15. Lil Nas X Trolls Right-Wingers With Mocking Apology For His New Satan Shoes
  16. LISTEN: Jay-Z ft. Pharrell - Change Clothes (DJ Kasir X Tera Kora 'Boukman Bridge' Edit)

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
